channel.title: [Delta] Adding a tutorial island [Project 2006]
channel.description:
Hi,
I want to create a 'Tutorial Island'. Nothing fancy like Runescape's old tutorial island. I just want something like; You have to talk to the "Runescape Guide". He give's you infomation about the server. And then he teleport's you to lumbridge.. Nothing to hard to add i gues. I was just wondering about how to make it so if you logg in first time i teleports you to tutorial island. I'm using Project 2006, It's a Delta. Thanks, - Microfire

item.title: [Delta] Adding a tutorial island [Project 2006]
item.dc:creator: @Microfire Microfire
item.description:
@Microfire wrote:

Hi,

I want to create a ‘Tutorial Island’. Nothing fancy like Runescape’s old tutorial island.
I just want something like; You have to talk to the “Runescape Guide”. He give’s you infomation about the server.
And then he teleport’s you to lumbridge… Nothing to hard to add i gues.
I was just wondering about how to make it so if you logg in first time i teleports you to tutorial island.
I’m using Project 2006, It’s a Delta.
Thanks,
